Room.Name: Main Courtyard West
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the west side of the Castle Ragnar's open-air courtyard.
Room.LongDescription: A stone soffet overhangs the courtyard here, providing relief from both the sun and rain. You see three doors set in the marble wall, each a different color. There is nothing here to identify their purpose. To the east is the troop assembly floor, and further south is a couple of tents where you can hear the vendors hawking their wares. A narrow opening in the wall appears to make a right angle after a few meters inside the wall. If you go in there, you will have to squeeze to get in.
